topic.title: How To's with the HP Cloud OS Networking Service

body.p: Tasks are described as being performed by a user or administrator.

section.title: Tasks performed by users
section.p: The following Imaging service tasks are usually performed by someone with the user role.

section.title: Add / Remove a subnet to/from a Network
Add /Remove a network to/from a Router
Add / Remove an external network to/from a Router
Create / Update / Delete a port on a Network
Allocate / Deallocate a Floating IP address
Associate / Disassociate a Floating IP address to/from a Fixed IP address
Create / Modify / Delete a Security Group
Create / Modify / Delete a Security Group Rule
Tasks performed by an Administrator
section.p: The following Imaging service tasks are usually performed by someone with the administrator role.

section.title: Modify the quota values of a project
Add / Remove a network to/from a DHCP agent
Add / Remove a router to/from an L3 agent
For more information
section.p: Also see the Help topics that are available in the Operational Dashboard and Administration Dashboard. Website copies are available:
